markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wheedle and Jig](/Feats.aspx?ID=3352) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 65</row>

</column>

---

You make capering motions and silly sounds to captivate onlookers. You can cast [_enthrall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=104) as a 3rd-level arcane innate spell once per day.
name: Wheedle and Jig
